Name: Epidote Ca_2(Al,Fe^3+)_3O.SiO_4.Si_2O_7.OH
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Sorosilicate
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: SS-1A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: Mexico, Baja California Norte, Valle De La Trinidad
Collected by Burminco
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ss01aa.txt
